SELECT hu.*, hb.name, c.company_name AS companyName FROM house_unit hu LEFT JOIN house_building hb ON hu.build_id = hb.build_id LEFT JOIN sys_company c ON hu.company_id = c.company_id
AND hu.unit_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{parm.unitName}, '%')
AND hb.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{parm.buildNme}, '%')
AND hu.company_id = #{parm.companyId}
ORDER BY hu.unit_id DESC
